Pre-Game Insights: The Detroit Tigers are on a five-game winning streak
The Tigers swept a four-game series against the Chicago White Sox
Brant Hurter will be starting for the Tigers, his first start of the season
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Tigers are currently above.500 for the first time since 2016 after the All-Star break
Others: Mason Englert will be taking the mound for the Tigers
Griffin Canning will be starting for the Angels
The over/under for runs scored is set at nine
